pe9:1.1_0: Pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjāya ca bhavataṇhāya ca.
pe9:1.2_0: Tattha avijjānīvaraṇānaṁ taṇhāsaṁyojanānaṁ sattānaṁ pubbakoṭi na paññāyati.
pe9:2.2_0: Te pañcasu khandhesu attānaṁ samanupassanti “rūpavantaṁ vā attānaṁ, attani vā rūpaṁ, rūpasmiṁ vā attānan”ti.
pe9:2.4_0: Aññehi khandhehi attānaṁ samanupassanti tassa ussannadiṭṭhikā sattā vipassamānā khandhe ujuṁ attato samanupassanti.
pe9:2.9_0: Iti pañcannaṁ khandhānaṁ paṭhamābhinipātā sakkāyadiṭṭhiyo pañca ucchedaṁ bhajanti “taṁ jīvaṁ taṁ sarīran”ti.
pe9:2.10_0: Ekamekamhi khandhe tīhi padehi pacchimakehi sassataṁ bhajati “aññaṁ jīvaṁ aññaṁ sarīran”ti.
pe9:2.11_0: Ito bahiddhāte pabbajitā taṇhācaritā kāmasukhallikānuyogamanuyuttā viharanti.
pe9:2.12_0: Tena ye ca nissandena diṭṭhicaritā attakilamathānuyogamanuyuttā viharanti.
pe9:3.1_0: Tattha diṭṭhicaritā sattā ye ariyadhammavinayaṁ otaranti, te dhammānusārino honti.
pe9:3.2_0: Ye taṇhācaritā sattā ariyaṁ dhammavinayaṁ otaranti, te saddhānusārino honti.
pe9:4.1_0: Tattha ye diṭṭhicaritā sattā, te kāmesu dosadiṭṭhī,
pe9:4.1_1: na ca ye kāmesu anusayā samūhatā,
pe9:4.3_0: Añño vā sāvako kāmehi natthi atthoti te ca pubbeyeva kāmehi anatthikā iti kāme appakasirena paṭinissajjanti.
pe9:4.6_0: Ye pana taṇhācaritā sattā, te kāmesu ajjhositā,
pe9:4.7_0: Aññataro vā bhikkhu kāmehi natthi atthoti,
pe9:4.9_0: Iti ime sabbasattā dvīsu paṭipadāsu samosaraṇaṁ gacchanti dukkhāyañca sukhāyañca.
pe9:5.1_1: te dvidhā mudindriyā ca tikkhindriyā ca.
pe9:5.2_0: Tattha ye diṭṭhicaritā sattā tikkhindriyā sukhena paṭinissajjanti, khippañca abhisamenti,
pe9:5.3_0: Tattha ye diṭṭhicaritā sattā mudindriyā paṭhamaṁ tikkhindriyaṁ upādāya dandhataraṁ abhisamenti, te sukhena paṭinissajjanti, dandhañca abhisamenti.
pe9:5.5_0: Tattha taṇhācaritā sattā dvidhā tikkhindriyā ca mudindriyā ca.
pe9:5.6_0: Tattha ye taṇhācaritā sattā tikkhindriyā dukkhena paṭinissajjanti, khippañca abhisamenti.
pe9:5.8_0: Tattha ye taṇhācaritā sattā mudindriyā paṭhamaṁ tikkhindriyaṁ upādāya dandhataraṁ abhisamenti, te dukkhena paṭinissajjanti, dandhañca abhisamenti.
pe9:5.11_0: Ye hi keci nibbutā nibbāyissanti vā imāhi catūhi paṭipadāhi anaññāhi ayaṁ paṭipadācatukkena kilese niddisati.
pe9:6.2_0: Cattāro vipallāsā upādānā yogā ganthā āsavā oghā sallā viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo agatigamanāti,
pe9:7.2_0: Tattha yo ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro yo ca phasso āhāro, ime taṇhācaritena pahātabbā.
pe9:7.3_0: Tattha yo ca manosañcetanāhāro yo ca viññāṇāhāro, ime diṭṭhicaritena pahātabbā.
pe9:9.1_0: Tattha paṭhame vipallāse ṭhito kāme upādiyati, idaṁ kāmupādānaṁ.
pe9:9.2_0: Dutiye vipallāse ṭhito anāgataṁ bhavaṁ upādiyati, idaṁ sīlabbatupādānaṁ.
pe9:9.3_0: Tatiye vipallāse ṭhito viparīto diṭṭhiṁ upādiyati, idaṁ diṭṭhupādānaṁ.
pe9:9.4_0: Catutthe vipallāse ṭhito khandhe attato upādiyati, idaṁ attavādupādānaṁ.
pe9:10.1_0: Tattha kāmupādāne ṭhito kāme abhijjhāyati ganthati, ayaṁ abhijjhākāyagantho.
pe9:10.2_0: Sīlabbatupādāne ṭhito byāpādaṁ ganthati, ayaṁ byāpādakāyagantho.
pe9:10.3_0: Diṭṭhupādāne ṭhito parāmāsaṁ ganthati, ayaṁ parāmāsakāyagantho.
pe9:12.1_0: Te cattāro āsavā vepullabhāvaṁ gatā oghā honti, tena vuccanti “oghā”ti.
pe9:12.2_0: Tattha kāmāsavo kāmogho, bhavāsavo bhavogho, avijjāsavo avijjogho, diṭṭhāsavo diṭṭhogho.
pe9:13.1_0: Te cattāro oghā āsayamanupaviṭṭhā anusayasahagatā vuccanti.
pe9:13.3_0: Tattha kāmogho rāgasallaṁ, bhavogho dosasallaṁ, avijjogho mohasallaṁ, diṭṭhogho diṭṭhisallaṁ.
pe9:14.1_0: Imehi catūhi sallehi pariyādinnaṁ viññāṇaṁ catūsu dhammesu tiṭṭhati rūpe vedanāya saññāya saṅkhāresu.
pe9:14.3_0: Tattha rāgasallena nandūpasecanaṁ rūpūpagaṁ viññāṇaṁ tiṭṭhati.
pe9:14.4_0: Dosasallena vedanūpagaṁ mohasallena saññūpagaṁ diṭṭhisallena nandūpasecanaṁ saṅkhārūpagaṁ viññāṇaṁ tiṭṭhati.
pe9:15.1_0: Catūhi viññāṇaṭṭhitīhi catubbidhaṁ agatiṁ gacchanti chandā dosā bhayā mohā.
pe9:15.2_0: Rāgena chandā agatiṁ gacchati, dosena dosā agatiṁ gacchati, mohena mohā agatiṁ gacchati,
pe9:15.3_0: Iti idañca kammaṁ ime ca kilesā.
pe9:16.1_0: Tatthimā catasso disā kabaḷīkārāhāro “asubhe subhan”ti vipallāso kāmupādānaṁ kāmayogo abhijjhākāyagantho kāmāsavo kāmogho rāgasallaṁ rūpūpagā viññāṇaṭṭhiti chandā agatigamanaṁ.
pe9:17.1_0: Phasso āhāro “dukkhe sukhan”ti vipallāso sīlabbatupādānaṁ bhavayogobyāpādo kāyagantho bhavāsavo bhavogho dosasallaṁ vedanūpagā viññāṇaṭṭhiti dosā agatigamanaṁ, ayaṁ dutiyā disā.
pe9:18.1_0: Manosañcetanāhāro “anattani attā”ti vipallāso diṭṭhupādānaṁ diṭṭhiyogo parāmāsakāyagantho diṭṭhāsavo diṭṭhogho diṭṭhisallaṁ saññūpagā viññāṇaṭṭhiti bhayā agatigamanaṁ.
pe9:19.1_0: Viññāṇāhāro “anicce niccan”ti vipallāso attavādupādānaṁ avijjāyogo idaṁsaccābhiniveso kāyagantho avijjāsavo avijjogho mohasallaṁ saṅkhārūpagā viññāṇaṭṭhiti mohā agatigamanaṁ, ayaṁ catutthī disā.
pe9:19.2_0: Iti imesaṁ dasannaṁ suttānaṁ paṭhamena padena paṭhamāya disāya ālokanaṁ.
pe9:20.1_0: Catūhi vipallāsehi akusalapakkhe disāvilokanā kilesaṁ saṁyojetvā ayaṁ akusalapakkhe disāvilokanāya bhūmi pañcannaṁ dasannaṁ suttānaṁ yāni paṭhamāni padāni imesaṁ dhammānaṁ ko attho?
pe9:20.3_0: Evaṁ dutiyā evaṁ tatiyā evaṁ catutthī.
pe9:21.1_0: Iminā peyyālena sabbe kilesā catūsu padesu pakkhipitabbā.
pe9:21.2_0: Tato kusalapakkhe catasso paṭipadā cattāri jhānāni cattāro satipaṭṭhānā cattāro vihārā dibbo brahmā ariyo āneñjo cattāro sammappadhānā cattāro acchariyā abbhutadhammā cattāro adhiṭṭhānā cattāro samādhayo chandasamādhi vīriyasamādhi cittasamādhi vīmaṁsāsamādhi.
pe9:21.3_0: Cattāro dhammā sukhabhāgiyā nāññatra bojjhaṅgā nāññatra tapasā nāññatindriyasaṁvarā nāññatra sabbanissaggā cattāri appamāṇāni.
pe9:22.1_0: Tattha dukkhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā bhāviyamānā bahulīkariyamānā paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ paripūreti,
pe9:22.1_1: paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ paripuṇṇaṁ paṭhamaṁ satipaṭṭhānaṁ paripūreti,
pe9:22.1_2: paṭhamaṁ satipaṭṭhānaṁ paripuṇṇaṁ paṭhamaṁ vihāraṁ paripūreti,
pe9:22.1_3: paṭhamo vihāro paripuṇṇo paṭhamaṁ sammappadhānaṁ paripūreti,
pe9:22.1_4: paṭhamaṁ sammappadhānaṁ paripuṇṇaṁ paṭhamaṁ acchariyaṁ abbhutadhammaṁ paripūreti,
pe9:22.1_5: paṭhamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo paripuṇṇo paṭhamaṁ adhiṭṭhānaṁ paripūreti,
pe9:22.2_0: Evaṁ yāva sabbanissaggo catutthaṁ appamāṇaṁ paripūreti.
pe9:23.1_0: Tattha paṭhamā ca paṭipadā paṭhamañca jhānaṁ paṭhamañca satipaṭṭhānaṁ paṭhamo ca vihāro paṭhamañca sammappadhānaṁ paṭhamo ca acchariyo abbhuto dhammo saccādhiṭṭhānañca chandasamādhi ca indriyasaṁvaro ca mettā ca appamāṇaṁ.
pe9:24.1_0: Dukkhā ca paṭipadā khippābhiññā dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ dutiyañca satipaṭṭhānaṁ dutiyo ca vihāro dutiyañca sammappadhānaṁ dutiyo ca acchariyo abbhuto dhammo cāgādhiṭṭhānaṁ cittasamādhi cattāro iddhipādā karuṇā ca appamāṇaṁ, ayaṁ dutiyā disā.
pe9:25.1_0: Sukhā ca paṭipadā dandhābhiññā tatiyañca jhānaṁ tatiyañca satipaṭṭhānaṁ tatiyo ca vihāro tatiyañca sammappadhānaṁ tatiyo ca acchariyo abbhuto dhammo paññādhiṭṭhānañca vīriyasamādhi ca bojjhaṅgā ca muditā ca appamāṇaṁ.
pe9:26.1_0: Sukhā ca paṭipadā khippābhiññā catutthaṁ jhānaṁ catutthañca satipaṭṭhānaṁ catuttho ca vihāro catutthañca sammappadhānaṁ catuttho ca acchariyo abbhuto dhammo upasamādhiṭṭhānañca vīmaṁsāsamādhi ca sabbanissaggo ca upekkhā appamāṇañca.
pe9:27.2_0: Cattāro ca āhārā catasso ca paṭipadā,
pe9:27.2_1: cattāro ca vipallāsā cattāro ca satipaṭṭhānā,
pe9:27.2_2: cattāri ca upādānāni cattāri ca jhānāni cattāro ca yogā vihārā ca, ganthā ca sammappadhānā ca,
pe9:27.2_3: āsavā ca acchariyā abbhutadhammā ca, oghā ca adhiṭṭhānāni ca, sallā ca samādhayo,
pe9:27.2_5: cattāri ca agatigamanāni cattāri ca appamāṇāni iti kusalākusalānaṁ paṭipakkhavasena yojanā, ayaṁ vuccati disālokano nayo.
pe9:28.1_1: yo ca dhammo kusalākusalaniddese paṭhamo disāniddeso,
pe9:28.1_2: imassa sotāpattiphalaṁ pariyosānaṁ dutiyaṁ sakadāgāmiphalaṁ, tatiyaṁ anāgāmiphalaṁ, catutthaṁ arahattaphalaṁ.
pe9:29.2_0: Ye ca dukkhāya paṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya khippābhiññāya ca niyyanti dve puggalā,
pe9:29.2_1: ye ca sukhāya paṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya khippābhiññāya ca niyyanti dve puggalā.
pe9:30.1_0: Imesaṁ catunnaṁ puggalānaṁ yo puggalo sukhāya paṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya niyyāti,
pe9:30.1_1: yo ca puggalo dukkhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya niyyāti.
pe9:30.3_0: Tattha yo sukhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya niyyāti, ayaṁ ugghaṭitaññū.
pe9:30.4_0: Yo pacchimo puggalo sādhāraṇo, ayaṁ vipañcitaññū.
pe9:30.5_0: Yo puggalo dandhābhiññāya dukkhāya paṭipadāya niyyāti, ayaṁ neyyo.
pe9:30.7_0: Ugghaṭitaññussa mudukā desanā, neyyassa tikkhā desanā,
pe9:31.2_0: Iti imesaṁ puggalānaṁ catūhi paṭipadāhi niyyānaṁ.
pe9:32.1_1: tīṇi akusalamūlāni tayo phassā tisso vedanā tayo upavicārā tayo saṅkilesā tayo vitakkā tayo pariḷāhā tīṇi saṅkhatalakkhaṇāni tisso dukkhatāti.
pe9:33.1_0: Tīṇi akusalamūlānīti lobho akusalamūlaṁ, doso akusalamūlaṁ, moho akusalamūlaṁ.
pe9:33.2_0: Tayo phassāti sukhavedanīyo phasso, dukkhavedanīyo phasso,
pe9:33.3_0: Tisso vedanāti sukhā vedanā dukkhā vedanā adukkhamasukhā vedanā.
pe9:34.3_0: Tattha manāpikena ārammaṇena lobho akusalamūlaṁ samuṭṭhahati.
pe9:34.4_5: kāmavitakkaṁ paṭicca uppajjate rāgajo pariḷāho rāgajaṁ pariḷāhaṁ paṭicca uppajjate uppādo saṅkhatalakkhaṇo,
pe9:35.3_6: dosajaṁ pariḷāhaṁ paṭicca uppajjate ṭhitassa aññathattaṁ saṅkhatalakkhaṇaṁ,
pe9:35.3_7: ṭhitassa aññathattaṁ saṅkhatalakkhaṇaṁ paṭicca uppajjate dukkhadukkhatā vedanā.
pe9:36.3_1: adukkhamasukhavedanīyaṁ phassaṁ paṭicca uppajjate adukkhamasukhā vedanā,
pe9:36.3_6: mohajaṁ pariḷāhaṁ paṭicca uppajjate vayo saṅkhatalakkhaṇaṁ,
pe9:37.1_0: Iti tīṇi akusalamūlāni na catutthāni na pañcamāni,
pe9:37.1_1: tayo phassāti tisso vedanā yāva saṅkhatadukkhatāti, yo koci akusalapakkho,
pe9:38.2_1: tisso paññā sutamayī paññā cintāmayī paññā bhāvanāmayī paññā.
pe9:39.1_2: sutamayī paññā paripuṇṇā savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ samādhiṁ paripūreti,
pe9:39.1_3: savitakko savicāro samādhi paripuṇṇo adhicittasikkhaṁ paripūreti,
pe9:40.1_1: cintāmayī paññā paripuṇṇā avitakkavicāramattaṁ samādhiṁ paripūreti.
pe9:41.1_1: bhāvanāmayī paññā paripuṇṇā avitakkaavicāraṁ samādhiṁ paripūreti,
pe9:41.1_2: avitakko avicāro samādhi paripuṇṇo adhipaññāsikkhaṁ paripūreti,
pe9:42.1_0: Iti ime tayo dhammā kusalapakkhikā sabbe kusalā dhammā tīhi tikaniddesehi niddisiyanti tīṇi vimokkhamukhāni tassa pariyosānaṁ.
pe9:42.2_0: Tattha paṭhamena appaṇihitaṁ, dutiyena suññataṁ, tatiyena animittaṁ.
pe9:42.3_0: Ayaṁ vuccati dutiyo tipukkhalo nāma nayo.
pe9:43.1_0: Tattha ye ime tayo puggalā ugghaṭitaññū vipañcitaññū neyyoti.
pe9:43.2_0: Imesaṁ tiṇṇaṁ puggalānaṁ ye ca puggalā sukhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya,
pe9:43.2_1: sukhāya paṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya ca niyyanti, te dve puggalā.
pe9:43.3_0: Ye ca dve puggalā dukkhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya,
pe9:43.3_2: ime cattāro tena visesena dve bhavanti diṭṭhicarito ca taṇhācarito ca.
pe9:43.4_0: Ime cattāro bhavitvā tayo bhavanti, tayo bhavitvā dve bhavanti.
pe9:43.5_0: Imesaṁ dvinnaṁ puggalānaṁ ayaṁ saṅkileso, avijjā ca taṇhā ca, ahirikañca anottappañca, assati ca asampajaññañca,
pe9:43.5_1: nīvaraṇāni ca saṁyojanāni ca, ajjhosānañca abhiniveso ca, ahaṅkāro ca mamaṅkāro ca, assaddhiyañca dovacassañca,
pe9:43.5_2: kosajjañca ayoniso ca manasikāro, vicikicchā ca abhijjhā ca,
pe9:44.1_0: Tattha avijjā ca ahirikañca assati ca nīvaraṇāni ca ajjhosānañca ahaṅkāro ca assaddhiyañca kosajjañca vicikicchā ca asaddhammassavanañca, ayaṁ ekā disā.
pe9:45.1_0: Taṇhā ca anottappañca asampajaññañca saṁyojanāni ca abhiniveso ca mamaṅkāro ca dovacassatā ca ayoniso manasikāro ca abhijjhā ca asamāpatti ca, ayaṁ dutiyā disā.
pe9:45.2_0: Dasannaṁ dukānaṁ dasa padāni paṭhamāni kātabbāni.
pe9:45.3_0: Saṅkhittena atthaṁ ñāpenti paṭipakkhe kaṇhapakkhassa sabbesaṁ dukānaṁ dasa padāni dutiyakāni, ayaṁ dutiyā disā.
pe9:46.1_0: Iti akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ dukkhaniddeso, ayaṁ samudayo.
pe9:46.2_0: Yaṁ taṁ dhammaṁ ajjhāvasati nāmañca rūpañca idaṁ dukkhaṁ iti ayañca samudayo, idañca dukkhaṁ,
pe9:46.2_1: imāni dve saccāni dukkhañca samudayo ca nandiyāvaṭṭassa nayassa paṭhamaniddeso.
pe9:47.2_0: Samatho ca vipassanā ca, vijjā ca caraṇañca, sati ca sampajaññañca, hirī ca ottappañca,
pe9:47.2_3: sammāsati ca sammāsamādhi ca, paññā ca nibbidā ca,
pe9:48.1_0: Tattha samatho ca vijjā ca sati ca hirī ca ahaṅkārappahānañca sammāvāyāmo ca sammāsati ca paññā ca samāpatti ca somanassañca, ime dhammā ekā disā.
pe9:48.2_0: Vipassanā ca caraṇañca sampajaññañca ottappañca mamaṅkārappahānañca yoniso manasikāro ca sammāsamādhi ca nibbidā ca saddhammassavanañca dhammānudhammappaṭipatti ca, ayaṁ dutiyā disā.
pe9:48.3_0: Iti kusalapakkhe ca akusalapakkhe ca nandiyāvaṭṭassa pana nayassa catasso disā.
pe9:49.1_0: Tāsu yāni akusalapakkhassa paṭhamāni padāni akusalāni kusalehi pahānaṁ gacchanti,
pe9:49.1_1: tāni kusalapakkhe dutiyehi padehi pahānaṁ gacchanti.
pe9:49.2_0: Tesaṁ pahānā rāgavirāgā cetovimutti yāni akusalapakkhassa dutiyāni akusalapadāni pahānaṁ gacchanti,
pe9:49.2_1: tāni kusalapakkhassa paṭhamehi padehi pahānaṁ gacchanti.
pe9:49.4_0: Imesaṁ tiṇṇaṁ nayānaṁ paṭhamo nayo sīhavikkīḷito nāma.
pe9:49.5_0: Aṭṭha padāni cattāri ca kusalāni cattāri ca akusalāni imāni aṭṭha padāni mūlapadāni,
pe9:49.6_0: So chahi dhammehi neti kusalamūlāni ca neti akusalamūlāni ca,
pe9:49.6_1: iti imāni cha padāni purimakāni ca aṭṭha mūlapadāni imāni cuddasa padāni aṭṭhārasannaṁ mūlapadānaṁ.
pe9:49.7_0: Tattha yo pacchimako nayo nandiyāvaṭṭo, so catūhi dhammehi neti.
pe9:49.8_0: Avijjāya ca taṇhāya ca samathena ca vipassanāya ca,
pe9:49.8_1: ime cattāro dhammā imāni aṭṭhārasa mūlapadāni tīsu nayesu niddiṭṭhāni.
pe9:50.2_0: Tesañca navannaṁ mūlānaṁ cattāri padāni sīhavikkīḷitanaye tīṇi tipukkhale dve nandiyāvaṭṭe, iccete kusalassa pakkhā.
pe9:50.4_0: Tattha sīhavikkīḷite naye cattāri padāni tīṇi tipukkhale dve nandiyāvaṭṭe imāni nava padāni kusalāni niddiṭṭhāni.
pe9:51.1_0: Tattha yāni nandiyāvaṭṭe naye cattāri padāni,
pe9:51.2_1: samatho ca alobho ca adoso ca asubhasaññā ca dukkhasaññā ca imāni kusalapakkhe pañca padāni samathaṁ bhajanti.
pe9:51.3_0: Vipassanā ca amoho ca aniccasaññā ca anattasaññā ca imāni cattāri padāni vipassanaṁ bhajanti.
pe9:51.4_0: Imāni nava padāni kusalāni dvīsu padesu yojitāni,
pe9:51.4_1: tattha akusalapakkhe navannaṁ akusalamūlapadānaṁ yā ca taṇhā yo ca lobho yo ca doso yā ca subhasaññā yā ca sukhasaññā,
pe9:51.5_0: Yā ca avijjā yo ca moho yā ca niccasaññā yā ca attasaññā,
pe9:51.7_0: Iti tayo nayā ekaṁ nayaṁ na paviṭṭhā.
pe9:52.1_0: Kathaṁ aṭṭhārasa mūlapadāni, tipukkhale naye yujjanti?
pe9:52.2_1: vipassanā ca amoho ca aniccasaññā ca anattasaññā ca, imāni cattāri padāni;
pe9:52.3_0: amoho ca samatho ca alobho ca asubhasaññā ca, imāni cattāri padāni;
pe9:52.4_1: evaṁ imāni nava padāni tīsu kusalesu yojetabbāni.
pe9:52.5_0: Tattha navannaṁ padānaṁ akusalānaṁ taṇhā ca lobho ca subhasaññā ca sukhasaññā ca,
pe9:52.6_0: avijjā ca moho ca niccasaññā ca attasaññā ca ayaṁ moho ayaṁ doso,
pe9:52.6_1: ye ca imāni nava padāni tīsu akusalesu yojitāni.
pe9:52.7_0: Evaṁ aṭṭhārasa mūlapadāni kusalamūlesu ca yojetvā tipukkhalena nayena niddisitabbāni.
pe9:53.1_0: Kathaṁ aṭṭhārasa mūlapadāni sīhavikkīḷite naye yujjanti?
pe9:53.2_0: Taṇhā ca subhasaññā ca, ayaṁ paṭhamo vipallāso.
pe9:53.3_0: Lobho ca sukhasaññā ca, ayaṁ dutiyo vipallāso.
pe9:53.4_0: Avijjā ca niccasaññā ca, ayaṁ tatiyo vipallāso.
pe9:53.5_0: Moho ca attasaññā ca, ayaṁ catuttho vipallāso.
pe9:53.6_0: Iti nava padāni akusalamūlāni catūsu padesu yojitāni.
pe9:53.7_0: Tattha navannaṁ mūlapadānaṁ kusalānaṁ samatho ca asubhasaññā ca, idaṁ paṭhamaṁ satipaṭṭhānaṁ.
pe9:53.8_0: Alobho ca dukkhasaññā ca, idaṁ dutiyaṁ satipaṭṭhānaṁ.
pe9:53.9_0: Vipassanā ca aniccasaññā ca, idaṁ tatiyaṁ satipaṭṭhānaṁ.
pe9:53.10_0: Amoho ca anattasaññā ca, idaṁ catutthaṁ satipaṭṭhānaṁ.
pe9:53.12_0: Imesaṁ tiṇṇaṁ nayānaṁ yā bhūmi ca yo rāgo ca yo doso ca ekaṁ nayaṁ pavisati.
pe9:53.13_0: Ekassa nayassa akusale vā dhamme kusale vā dhamme viññāte paṭipakkho anvesitabbo,
pe9:53.13_1: paṭipakkhe anvesitvā so nayo niddisitabbo, tamhi naye niddiṭṭho.
pe9:53.14_0: Yathā ekamhi naye sabbe nayā paviṭṭhā tathā niddisitabbā.
pe9:53.15_0: Ekamhi ca naye aṭṭhārasa mūlapadāni paviṭṭhāni,
pe9:53.15_1: tamhi dhamme viññāte sabbe dhammā viññātā honti.
pe9:53.16_0: Imesaṁ tiṇṇaṁ nayānaṁ sīhavikkīḷitanayassa cattāri phalāni pariyosānaṁ.
pe9:53.19_0: Paṭhamāya disāya appaṇihitaṁ, dutiyāya disāya suññataṁ, tatiyāya disāya animittaṁ.
pe9:53.20_0: Nandiyāvaṭṭassa nayassa rāgavirāgā cetovimutti avijjāvirāgā ca paññāvimutti pariyosānaṁ.
pe9:53.22_0: Ime tayo nayā imesaṁ tiṇṇaṁ nayānaṁ aṭṭhārasannaṁ mūlapadānaṁ ālokanā, ayaṁ vuccati disālokano nayo.
pe9:53.23_0: Āloketvāna jānāti “ayaṁ dhammo imaṁ dhammaṁ bhajatī”ti sammā yojanā.
pe9:53.24_0: Kusalapakkhe akusalapakkhe ca ayaṁ nayo aṅkuso nāma.
pe9:64.1_0: Yāni catukkāni akusalāni kusalāni ca sīhavikkīḷite naye niddiṭṭhāni,
pe9:64.1_1: tikāni kusalāni ca akusalāni ca tipukkhale naye niddiṭṭhāni,
pe9:64.1_2: dukāni kusalāni ca akusalāni ca nandiyāvaṭṭe naye niddiṭṭhāni.
pe9:64.2_0: Yesu dvīsu dhammesu kusalesu so attho tikesu vibhajjamānassa bhavabhūmi,
pe9:64.2_1: atha ca sabbo ca attho tīhi byañjanehi niddisati.
pe9:64.4_0: Yo attho catūhi padehi aṭṭhavīsatibhāgehi natthibhūmi niddisituṁ,
pe9:64.5_0: Iti yaṁ yathāniddiṭṭhassa avikosanā idaṁ pamāṇaṁ.
pe9:64.6_0: Yathā sabbe samādhayo tīsu samādhīsu pariyesitabbā,
pe9:64.6_1: savitakkasavicāre avitakkavicāramatte avitakkaavicāre idaṁ pamāṇaṁ, natthi catuttho samādhi.
pe9:64.7_0: Tathā tisso paññā cintāmayī sutamayī bhāvanāmayī sabbāsu paññāsu niddisati,
pe9:64.7_1: natthi catutthī paññā na cintāmayī na sutamayī na bhāvanāmayī,
pe9:64.7_2: paññā nāssa atthi imesaṁ dhammānaṁ yā avikkhepanā, idaṁ vuccati pamāṇanti.
